author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Hello, Rushia... I learnt about the meaning of "Guerrilla Stream". I just woke up only for listening your singing voice, but I didn't know about to stream at same time, by the way I was watching you using 2 machines (My mobile phone and my tablet)

Also, it was a great adventure... watching you at guerrilla stream and watching your video cover.
Also you sang for encore before the "Supacha yomi Time"

I'm not wrong... About time ago, my master once said to me: "If you know an angel, don't hesitate to introduce me to me"
Well... He's gone now, so I'm continuing his legacy, but he'd be very happy to know that I've found an Angel here. ❤️
